## SkygearError.message property

Error message.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
message: string;
```

## Remarks

Error messages are provided for convenience, and not stable APIs; Consumers should use [SkygearError.name](./node-client.skygearerror.name.md) or [SkygearError.reason](./node-client.skygearerror.reason.md) to distinguish between different errors.
